name: Fully Faithful Functor
definition:
A **Functor** $F:C\to D$ is called **fully faithful** when the induced function on Hom sets
$$
F_{X,Y}: Hom_C(X,Y)\to Hom_D(X,Y)
$$
is **bijective**.
description: A **fully faithful functor** is a #functor that is bijective on Hom sets, i.e. it is a #full and a #faithful.
